name: Whac-A-Nomicon
description:
Whac-A-Nomicon is a fast-paced, Lovecraftian-themed Whack-a-Mole game made for Summer Slow Jams 2019: Arcade. 

  • Whack the Cthulhoids with your hammer
  • Dodge attacks from the Old Ones' gates
  • Avoid the Bombthulhoids
  • Hang out with your buddy, Cthulhu!

I'm currently working on a mobile AR adaptation of this game with new features. Follow me on Twitter for more updates!

How To Play

  • Use the WASD  keys to move towards the altar and start the game
  • Move your mouse cursor to move the camera
  • Use Numpad Keys 1-9  or left mouse click to whack Cthulhoids
  • Left mouse click to hit portals or Cthulhoids
  • Please make sure hardware acceleration / WebGL  is enabled in your browser! 

Thanks to the folks at Pig Squad for the great event and to Nihilore for the great synthwave music.
